title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer tomato, mozzarella, and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.

title: Garlic Olive Oil Pasta
instructions: Gently sauté sliced garlic in olive oil.
Toss pasta with garlic oil, chili flakes, parsley, and salt.

title: Veggie Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Add eggs, cook until set, fold and serve.

title: Peanut Stir Fry
instructions: Whisk soy sauce, peanut butter, and a splash of water.
Stir-fry garlic, ginger, veggies, then tofu.
Add sauce, toss to coat, finish with sesame oil.
